body:
I thought ONNX never supported handles at all, because it never supported backward export, and that's what the handles were originally added for. There is a bunch of special cases in the ONNX pass to make sure we handle handles correctly, but they're mostly checking if the handle is actually unused (which it should be if no backwards occurred.)

In any case if you guys need this to unblock I wouldn't block on this.

I thought ONNX never supported handles at all, because it never supported backward export, and that's what the handles were originally added for. There is a bunch of special cases in the ONNX pass to make sure we handle handles correctly, but they're mostly checking if the handle is actually unused (which it should be if no backwards occurred.)
